item.description:
Party at my Condo. We can have a Wii competition.  Wii is new to me so I probably would not be your competition! Parking is limited. Find a spot across the house or up the hill to the right. Hope to see you.

This will be a pot luck style event. I will provide soda and water.    I could fire up some frozen pizzas too.

Please use MapQuest to find me. Cross street is 47 Ledgeview Drive. If you call me for directions, then you do not know me well enough!

 

Charlie - 603-969-2654
item.how_to_find_us: 24 Split Rock drive, Rochester NH 03839 (use Mapquest)

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Pot Luck - Wii party
